profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Dallas, Dallas County, Tex., May 1967; graduated from Highland Park High School, University Park, Tex.; B.A., Pepperdine University, Malibu, Calif., 1990; M.B.A., Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, Pa., 1998; United States Navy, 1991-1996; investment banker; business executive; business owner; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 2023-present).
